title: Animation-Based Learning Design for Understanding Soccer Tactics

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Soccer Rules and Game Flow
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, combining offline sessions with online content

learning_goals: Learners can identify key soccer tactics (attack/defense formations) based on game situations with 80% accuracy.
Learners can select a learning pace tailored to their individual proficiency using an animation speed-adjustment feature.
Learners can effectively utilize learning materials by selecting static images or dynamic animations depending on the context.

resources: Digital Textbook with Adjustable Speed Functionality
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
